title: See the pics of Sir Cliff Richard on stage at the Royal Albert Hall
text:
See the pics of Sir Cliff Richard on stage at the Royal Albert Hall See the pics of Sir Cliff Richard on stage at the Royal Albert Hall 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Birthday boy Sir Cliff Richard took to the stage to celebrate his milestone with his legions of fans. 
Sir Cliff, who turned 75 on Wednesday, performed at the Royal Albert Hall, in central London, as part of his birthday tour. (John Stillwell/PA) 
Two days after marking his big day, when he also performed, Sir Cliff was belting out the hits from his 57-year career. (John Stillwell/PA) 
His chart-toppers include The Young Ones, Living Doll and Summer Holiday. In total, heâ€™s put out 123 singles and a startling 101 albums. (John Stillwell/PA) 
His career has also included spells as a presenter and actor. Share article 
His Birthday Tour at the Royal Albert Hall continues until Sunday. Promoted Stories
